Sappidāyaka Thera：1．Sappidāyaka Thera． An arahant．Ninety two kappas ago he gave an offering of ghee to Phussa Buddha．Fifty kappas ago he was a king named Samodaka．Ap．i．184．

2．Sappidāyaka Thera．An arahant．Ninety four kappas ago he saw Siddhattha Buddha lying ill and gave him some ghee．Seventeen kappas ago he was a king named Jutideva．Ap．i．212．
